title: User endpoint protection
objective: Secure employee devices against malware and unauthorized access.
implementation_guidance: Apply encryption on workstations and mobile devices

title: Network security
objective: Prevent unauthorized access and mitigate network-based threats.

title: Application security
objective: Protect software applications from vulnerabilities and attacks.

title: Secure system configuration
objective: Reduce system vulnerabilities through standardized security settings.
implementation_guidance: Define secure configurations for operating systems

title: Malware protection
objective: Detect and prevent malware infections in IT environments.

title: Data encryption
objective: Ensure sensitive data remains protected against unauthorized access.

title: Logging and monitoring
objective: Detect security incidents through real-time monitoring.

title: Backup and recovery
objective: Ensure data availability in case of cyberattacks or system failures.

title: Identity and access management
objective: Control user access to systems and sensitive information.

title: Secure authentication
objective: Prevent unauthorized logins and credential theft.

title: Cloud security
objective: Protect data stored and processed in cloud environments.

title: Security testing and vulnerability management
objective: Identify and remediate security weaknesses in IT systems.
